mapper.insert: insert into ecs_route (cId, cname, pstartId, cstartId, pmiddleId, cmiddleId, pendId, cendId, yprice, note) values (#{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pstartid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cstartid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmiddleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmiddleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pendid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cendid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_route set cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pstartId = #{pstartid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cstartId = #{cstartid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pmiddleId = #{pmiddleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cmiddleId = #{cmiddleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pendId = #{pendid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cendId = #{cendid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yprice = #{yprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cId = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cId, cname, pstartId, cstartId, pmiddleId, cmiddleId, pendId, cendId, yprice, note from ecs_route where cId = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cId, cname, pstartId, cstartId, pmiddleId, cmiddleId, pendId, cendId, yprice, note from ecs_route
